body_html: Actually I think the change would be as simple as saying that, for a tensor with first dimension d, trying to lookup for the row i where i < 0 or i >= d results in a tensor of the expected shape filled with 0s
body_text: Actually I think the change would be as simple as saying that, for a tensor with first dimension d, trying to lookup for the row i where i < 0 or i >= d results in a tensor of the expected shape filled with 0s
body: Actually I think the change would be as simple as saying that, for a tensor with first dimension _d_, trying to lookup for the row i where _i < 0_ or _i >= d_ results in a tensor of the expected shape filled with 0s
